# Network modifications

1. Reproductive readiness now links to 'Population 
structure and other characteristics'
2. Survival node split to 'Early life history survival' and
'Adult survival'
3. Added link from take 'egg sample' to 'Quantify egg quality'
4. Modified genetics so 'Monitor genetic composition' was
a means to Evaluate hybridization, Local adaptatiion, and estimate 
effective population size.
